nodes.text: The AJ^6 cyborg construct, also known as Lobot-Tech headgear, was a cybernetic device attached onto the backside of a user's head, designed to increase the user's productivity. However, it would often erase their personality and occasionally cause their behavior to become erratic. The Galactic Empire used the construct, and it was worn by the Rodian Tseebo of the Imperial Information Office, who utilized the technology to steal Imperial data. The Imperial controller designated LT-319 also wore the headset. Vice Chairman Anolo had his Givin codebreaker implanted with the technology. The technology was also in use on Cloud City, by the aide of Baron Administrator Lando Calrissian, Lobot.
